HelloMessage: File Cabinet Application, developed by Vladimir Bogomolov.
DeletePatthern:
delete where {parameter} = {value}.
Available parameters: id(integer), firstname(string), lastname(string), dateofbirth(date in format MM/dd/yyyy), height(integer), income(real number), patronymicletter(char).
ExportPatthern:
export {export type} {file path}.
Available export types: xml, csv.
ImportPatthern:
import {import type} {file path}.
Available import types: xml, csv.
InsertPatthern:
insert ({parameter1}, {parameter2}, {parameter3}...) values ({value1}, {value2}, {value3}...).
Available parameters: id(integer), firstname(string), lastname(string), dateofbirth(date in format MM/dd/yyyy), height(integer), income(real number), patronymicletter(char).
You need to input all 7 parameters.
SelectPatthern:
select {parameter X}, {parameter Y}... where {parameter A} = {value A} and/or {parameter B} = {value B}...
Also available patthern: select
And: select {parameter X}, {parameter Y}...
Available parameters: id(integer), firstname(string), lastname(string), dateofbirth(date in format MM/dd/yyyy), height(integer), income(real number), patronymicletter(char).
In first patthern you need to set at least 2 parameters as conditions and at least one parameter as output.
You must use only 'or' or only 'and' in conditions.
UpdatePatthern:
update set {parameter X} = {value X}, {parameter Y} = {value Y}... where {parameter A} = {value A} and {parameter B} = {value B}...
Available parameters: id(integer), firstname(string), lastname(string), dateofbirth(date in format MM/dd/yyyy), height(integer), income(real number), patronymicletter(char).
PurgeInMemory: Purge command can't be used in memory sevice.
HelpCommandHelp: The 'help' command prints the help screen.
StatCommandHelp: The 'stat' command returns amount of stored records.
CreateCommandHelp: The 'create' command creates new record with entered data.
ExportCommandHelp: The 'export' command exports current records into file of given format.
ImportCommandHelp: The 'import' command imports records from given file.
InsertCommandHelp: The 'insert' command inserts new record with entered data by given id.
DeleteCommandHelp: The 'delete' command deletes records from service.
UpdateCommandHelp: The 'update' command updates records with given values.
SelectCommandHelp: The 'select' command finds records by the given conditions.
CreateCommandShortHelp: creates new record with entered data
ExportCommandShortHelp: exports current records into file of given format
InsertCommandShortHelp: inserts new record with entered data by given id
SelectCommandShortHelp: finds records by the given conditions
HintMessage: Enter your command, or enter 'help' to get help.
InvalidInput: Invalid input data. Fix your input.
2SearchConditions: Must be at least 2 search conditions.
OneParamToOneProp: Set one parameter to find to one property.
NoRecordsWithValue: Records with given value(s) aren't exist.
NullRecordsSequence: Sequence of records must be not null.
NullValidatorSequence: Sequence of validators must be not null.
NullValidatorBuilder: Validator builder must be not null.
NullFieldsAndValues: Fields and values to set must be not null.
RecordIdExist: Record with given id already exists.
FailConversionStringToDate: Can't convert given string to DateTime.
MissingRule: Can't find validation rule by key
InvalidDate: DateTime must be in format MM/dd/yyyy
InvalidChar: Char must be a single Unicode symbol
ValidationOutOfRange: Validation values is out of type range.
InvalidTypeSyzeData: Type syze data in appsettings.json is invalid.
